sentences.en: Now given the right data, machines are going to outperform humans at tasks like this.
sentences.cn: 现在，只要有了正确的数据，机器在这类任务上的表现将超过人类。

sentences.en: She writes that, unlike most countries that outperform the United States on international assessments, American schools put too much of an emphasis on athletics.
sentences.cn: 她写道，与大多数在国际评估中超过美国的国家不同，美国学校过于强调体育运动。

sentences.en: European shares could also outperform Wall Street.
sentences.cn: 欧洲股票的表现将优于华尔街。
